ArticHost has Some Professional-Grade VPSes at Great Prices! (Chicago Windows of Linux Starting at $3.99/mo!)

artichost, chicago, linux, windows January 28, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Victor from ArticHost stepped up to offer us some nice VPS offers with either Windows or Linux.

  • 2GB RAM, 60GB Storage, unmetered bandwidth on a 100Mbps line with DDoS protection for $4.99/month for Windows!
  • Same specs for Linux as well!
  • Use coupon code: “TWENTYOFF” to get 20% off all orders for the life of the VPS!

Looks like an interesting company.  First time I’ve ever seen a provider offering FOREX VPS Hosting.  Many providers say “no FOREX” in their TOS due to the load, so it’s intriguing to see a host specializing in this market.

Their offers look very full-featured – 24/7 support, free backups, and DDoS protection.

They also appear to be geared up for the long haul.  They rent several racks in the SBA EDGE datacenter in West Chicago, IL and nightly replicate their SSD SAN storage.  That kind of protection is not common and pretty cool to see in this market.

Here’s a little about them in their own words:

“ArticHost LLC provides semi-managed VPS plans at ridiculously cheap prices. As stated earlier all of our VPS
are stored on a SSD SAN appliance. Most VPS providers just use local storage and don’t back up your VPS; we do it differently.  All of our VPS reside on a SAN appliance that gets replicated to a redundant one nightly.  Furthermore, although our plans are semi-managed, we still go above and beyond to support our customers.  We configure webservers, install scripts like wordpress, troubleshoot performance, and fix script issues.”

They are a registered company in Delaware (they submitted a copy of their corporate formation acknowledgement to LEB).  You should review their TOS and if you like what you see, you can pay with Stripe (credit cards), 2checkout (credit/debit), Paypal, or Bitpay.

This is the first time ArticHost has appeared on LowEndBox, so we’d love for some folks to comment below on their experiences!
